details.title: Baseband Modeling and Distortion Equalization of the DeLange FM Oscillator by Functional Methods
details.abstract: Exact and approximate baseband models of the DeLange frequency-modulated oscillator are derived. Exact and approximate baseband distortion equalizers, that may be used to predistort the modulation voltage so that the distortion in the output phase of the oscillator is removed, are also given.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
